channel.title: PI dragon claws

item.title: PI dragon claws
item.dc:creator: @katerfew katerfew
item.description:
@katerfew wrote:

i was following the tutorial on how to add dragon claws but then i got 3 errors, fixed a couple, but then i got this error:
int could not be dereferenced

Here is my code:

case 14484: // Dragon claws
c.startAnimation(6000);
c.specDamage = 1.25;
c.specAccuracy = 1.85;
c.gfx0(-1);
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon])).toLowerCase();
break;

Read full topic
